events.title: Hull Lifesaving Museum’s Annual Meeting
events.description: This meeting is open to museum members as well as the general public.  This is a great opportunity to meet the museum staff and Board Of Directors and to hear a brief update on what is happening at the museum.  You are also invited to view there current exhibit "Mary Evelyn Sparrow-Speaking Of Courage Photography…
events.where: Hull Life Saving Museum, 1117 Nantasket Avenue, Hull, 02045

events.title: Beachy Business Meeting
events.description: Patsy Whitney, Real Estate Agent of William Raveis, will be hosting a Beachy Business Meeting at 10 Whitehead Ave., Hull, a home she has listed for sale. This Beachy Business Meeting is open not only to Chamber Members, Hull Business Owners, but also to possible buyers, and to the Community as a whole. Wine and…

events.title: Winter Warrior Games by Wellspring Multi-Service Center
events.description: Almost 30 years ago, residents of Hull began taking the dive into the freezing winter water to raise money for Wellspring Multi-Service Centers.  Formerly known as " Drowned Hogs," they are expanding and rebranding this year into the Wellspring Winter Warrior Games! With a new look and new focus on families and some friendly competition,…
events.where: http://nantasketbeachcarshow.com/

events.title: 27th Annual Sea & Sky Art Exhibit
events.description: A feast for winter-weary eyes, our 27th Annual Sea & Sky juried art show celebrates the beauty of our coastal environment and richness of the artistic community on the South Shore and beyond. All media are welcome. Artists may submit three works of art for consideration in the juried exhibition.  All work must be original,…

events.title: Lecture with Adrienne Murphy, President, South Shore Neptune Skin Divers Club
events.description: Meet Adrienne Murphy, President of the South Shore Neptune Skin Divers, one of the oldest dive clubs in the country. Since 1955 the club has attracted members from all over Eastern Massachusetts.  In 1967 the South Shore Neptunes was the first dive club to accept women divers.  Their membership includes over 130 sports divers ranging…

events.title: Linda Greenlaw-Swordfishing Boat Captain & Best-Selling Author
events.description: Linda Greenlaw, best-selling author of books with maritime themes will be at the Hull Lifesaving Museum to share the lifesaving lessons learned during her fast-paced career as the only female swordfishing boat captain on the East Coast of the United States.  She was featured in the 1997 book and film " The Perfect Storm." Greenlaw…
